options.name: Long Range Training
options.description: You have specialized in extreme-distance precision shooting with bows and crossbows. Your optimal range for all ranged weapons is extended by one category (Short becomes Moderate, Moderate becomes Distant, etc.).

options.name: Patient Hunter
options.description: Sniping requires exceptional patience and stillness. Gain +1 skill with concentration. When you remain stationary for a full round, your next ranged attack gains a bonus dice.

options.name: Wind Reader
options.description: You can read environmental conditions to improve your shots. Gain +1 skill with senses. You automatically know wind direction and strength, and can ignore weather penalties to ranged attacks.

options.name: Action : Aimed Shot
options.description: You take careful aim at a distant target. Make a ranged attack with a penalty dice, but if it hits, roll an additional damage dice and add it to your total damage.

options.name: Action : Precision Shot
options.description: You target a specific weak point or gap in armor. Make a ranged attack that ignores physical mitigation if it hits, but you roll with two penalty dice.

options.name: Reaction : Opportunity Shot
options.description: In response to a creature moving into your optimal range, you can immediately make a ranged attack against them with a bonus dice if you haven't moved this round.

options.name: Master Sniper
options.description: Your precision with ranged weapons at extreme distances is unmatched. Gain +1 skill with complex ranged weapons. You can attack targets up to two range categories beyond your optimal range (with normal penalties).

options.name: Killing Shot
options.description: Your shots at weak targets are devastatingly effective. When you deal damage to a minion or grunt tier creature with a ranged attack, they must make an endurance check of 8 or be instantly killed regardless of remaining health.

options.name: Suppressing Fire
options.description: You can control the battlefield through sustained fire. Gain +1 skill with simple ranged weapons. When you make ranged attacks against multiple targets in the same round, each target after the first has a penalty dice on their next action.

options.name: Legendary Marksman
options.description: You have achieved legendary accuracy at impossible ranges. Your ranged attacks can target creatures up to three range categories beyond optimal range. When you score a critical hit with a ranged weapon, the target must make a resilience check of 10 or become stunned from shock.
